org.fhaes.fhrecorder.view

Class ErrorDisplayPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.fhaes.fhrecorder.view.ErrorDisplayPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ErrorDisplayPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    ErrorDisplayPanel Class. This UI is used to address erroneous FHX2 files whenever they are attempted to be loaded.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
